allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add security protection against inspect, screenshot, screen recording and download

- Add SecurityProvider component to wrap entire app
- Block DevTools shortcuts \(F12, Ctrl+Shift+I, Ctrl+U, etc.\)
- Block right-click context menu
- Block copy/cut/drag operations
- Detect window blur for Snipping Tool protection
- Blur content when window loses focus
- Block PrintScreen and clear clipboard
- Block screen capture API
- Add CSS security styles with blur effect
- Show warning message when capture attempted
- Disable printing
